channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 40 Percent of Young Adults Get Their News From TikTok
item.description: More and more young adults are getting their news from TikTok, according to Pew Research Center survey results.

item.title: Exploding Hezbollah Pagers Triggered by Spoofed Message From Hezbollah Leaders
